scripts.dev-proxy: npm run build && SET NODE_ENV=development && SET DEV_SERVER=1 && vite
scripts.build: npm clean_build && npm create_version && npm create_prerelease
scripts.create_dist: npm prepare_version && cpx versions_prerelease.json docs && npm prepare_dist && npm copy_assets
scripts.prepare_dist: cpx versions.json docs && cpx manifest.json %npm_config_directory% && cpx plugin_formit.js %npm_config_directory%
scripts.copy_assets: cpx src/assets/* %npm_config_directory%/assets && cpx build/assets/* %npm_config_directory%/assets && cpx src/Addins/* %npm_config_directory%
